# Label Manifest (jig.nvim)

Use `.github/scripts/sync_labels.sh` to apply this manifest to GitHub.

| name | color | description |
|---|---|---|
| incident | B60205 | Operational incident tracking issue |
| sev0 | D93F0B | Critical impact, immediate response |
| sev1 | FBCA04 | Major impact without practical workaround |
| sev2 | 0E8A16 | Degraded behavior with workaround |
| sev3 | 1D76DB | Low-impact defect or docs mismatch |
| surface:startup | 5319E7 | Failure surface: startup |
| surface:cmdline | 5319E7 | Failure surface: cmdline |
| surface:completion | 5319E7 | Failure surface: completion |
| surface:lsp | 5319E7 | Failure surface: lsp |
| surface:ui | 5319E7 | Failure surface: ui |
| surface:performance | 5319E7 | Failure surface: performance |
| surface:platform | 5319E7 | Failure surface: platform |
| surface:integration | 5319E7 | Failure surface: integration |
| surface:agent | 5319E7 | Failure surface: agent |
| surface:security | 5319E7 | Failure surface: security |
